about:
Several things and characteristics about me:

Quantum physics/mathematics/Astronomy enthusiast. (Many people say I have only differential equations and particles in my head, and absolutely no common sense.)

I'm terrible in sports or any physical activity.

Member of the physics club in my school.

An enthusiast of horology. I have a Montblanc and Omega. My dream watch would be a Patek Philippe Grande Complication. (Minimum of 250,000 dollars)

A retard in social activity and social standings. (I failed the common sense and social cues in my i.q test.)

I am now learning differential calculus (easy calculus) and complex mathematics for the funs!!!
